mapper.select: SELECT sys_role.role_id,sys_role.role_name, sys_user.user_id,sys_user.username, sys_role_kbi.KBI_id,sys_kbi.KBI_name,sys_role_kbi.KBI_ratio, perf.kbi_score,perf.year,perf.updown FROM sys_role LEFT JOIN sys_role_kbi on sys_role_kbi.role_id = sys_role.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_kbi on sys_role_kbi.KBI_id = sys_kbi.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role on sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user on sys_user.user_id = sys_user_role.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from perf_assess where perf_assess.year = '${year}' and perf_assess.updown = '${updown}' and perf_assess.user_id = '${userId}')perf on perf.kbi_id = sys_role_kbi.KBI_id and perf.check_user_id = sys_user.user_id where sys_role.role_id != 1 and sys_user.user_id is not NULL and sys_user.user_id in (SELECT ren_kbi_person.user_id FROM ren_kbi_person WHERE year = '${year}' and updown = '${updown}') ORDER BY sys_role.role_id,sys_user.user_id,sys_role_kbi.KBI_id ASC
select count(1) from perf_assess where perf_assess.year = '${year}' and perf_assess.updown = '${updown}' and perf_assess.user_id = '${userId}'

SELECT sys_user.user_id,sys_user.username, sys_role.role_id,sys_role.role_name, ren_record.duty_id,set_score_duty.duty as dutyName,set_score_kbi_duty.standard_score, ren_record.title_lever,set_score_title.job_title as titleName,set_score_kbi_title.standard_score as titleStandScore from sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_user_role on sys_user_role.user_id = sys_user.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role on sys_role.role_id = sys_user_role.role_id LEFT JOIN ren_record on ren_record.user_id = sys_user.user_id LEFT JOIN set_score_kbi_duty on set_score_kbi_duty.duty_id = ren_record.duty_id LEFT JOIN set_score_duty on set_score_kbi_duty.duty_id = set_score_duty.id LEFT JOIN set_score_kbi_title on set_score_kbi_title.title_id = ren_record.title_lever LEFT JOIN set_score_title on set_score_title.id = ren_record.title_lever where sys_role.role_id is not NULL and sys_role.role_id != 1
and sys_user.user_id in (SELECT ren_kbi_person.user_id FROM ren_kbi_person WHERE year = '${year}' and updown = '${updown}')
order by sys_role.role_id,sys_user.user_id asc

SELECT perf_assess.user_id,perf_assess.user_name from perf_assess where perf_assess.year = '${year}' and perf_assess.updown = '${updown}' and perf_assess.user_id in (SELECT ren_kbi_check.user_id FROM ren_kbi_check where ren_kbi_check.year = '${year}' and ren_kbi_check.updown = '${updown}') GROUP BY perf_assess.user_id,perf_assess.user_name
